creator: ParadoxInc
descriptionHtml:
Basics of Sign Language from Paradox Inc is a pocket library equipped with all the pre-requisites of sign language.

This app encloses ISL, ASL and BSL in an user-friendly interface that engages you with every sign. Inclusion of all 3 languages makes it far-reaching on a global scale. The aim is to deliver top-grade teaching that is efficient and easy-to-learn. Coupled with quizzes and interactive links, you can pulp out the best of material and learn with just a tap. We also provide access to all our sources and bibliography.

Why wait? Get on board and start learning.
descriptionShort: An app for learning the basics of sign language

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: An app made with Flutter for learning the basics of Sign Language

title: Basics of Sign Language

creator: ParadoxInc
descriptionHtml:
Basics of Sign Language from Paradox Inc is a pocket library equipped with all the pre-requisites of sign language.

This app encloses ISL(Indian Sign Language), ASL(American SL) and BSL(British SL) in an user-friendly interface that engages you with every sign. Inclusion of all 3 languages makes it far-reaching on a global scale. The aim is to deliver top-grade teaching that is efficient and easy-to-learn. Coupled with quizzes and interactive links, you can pulp out the best of material and learn with just a tap. We also provide access to all our sources and bibliography.

The all new feature for detecting sign or hand gestures is still under development, its just a prototype. It will be implemented soon! (Not available for ASL and BSL. Sorry!)

Why wait? Get on board and start learning.
descriptionShort: An app for learning the basics of sign language

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: An updated version of the app with some changes and an all new feature which detects sign or hand gestures and converts it to text!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

With this new update you can compare between two languages for alphabets and numbers (for a better understanding)
Also, the quiz feature updates will be coming up soon...

descriptionShort: An app for learning the basics of sign language

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A whole new update with an eye-catching designs/UI for the app, you will be able to select from different categories/regions based on your interests!
With this new update users can read FAQs about different sign language, attempt yes or no type of questions and compare between two languages for alphabets and numbers (for a better understanding)

Ability to rate the app and also share it to your friends, all these features are available in the app now... make sure to rate it!
